name: Plantastic Defense
description:
A 3D Tower Defense game based on plant as defender and pollution as attacker. Player will play as a commander to defend earth from gas pollution.

Development Team :

1. Akmal Irfan M (Game Designer)

2. Winner Insanjaya (Lead Game Programmer)

3. Kristian Rolando (Game Programmer)

4. Lesmana Wahyu (Game Programmer)

4. Muhammad Abdul Aziz (Lead 3D Game Artist)

5. Fahmi Kasri (Game Artist & Animator)
